```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
RB3 <- read_csv("RBdata3.csv")
pairs(RB3)
```
 
```{r}
View(abs(cor(RB3)[,1]))

lm2 <- lm(RB3$Y ~ RB3$X2)
summary(lm2)

lm5 <- lm(RB3$Y ~ RB3$X5)
summary(lm5)
library(car)
boxCox(lm5)

lm0 <- lm(RB3$Y ~ RB3$X10)
summary(lm0)

lm25083 <- lm(RB3$Y ~ RB3$X2 + RB3$X5 + RB3$X10 + RB3$X8 + RB3$X3 + RB3$X9 + RB3$X4)
summary(lm25083)

pairs(cbind(R = lm25083$res, Fit = lm25083$fit, RB3))

View(abs(cor(cbind(R = lm25083$res, Fit = lm25083$fit, RB3))[,1:3]))
```
